com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core

Interface ILPMessageListener


  • public interface ILPMessageListener
    A message listener receives updates concerning messages.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAdd(ILPMessage message)
      Informs this listener that a new message has been added to the message provider associated with the application.
      void onDelete(ILPID id)
      Informs this listener that a message previously known to the message provider associated with the application was deleted from the provider.
      void onModify(ILPMessage message)
      Informs this listener that a message already known to the message provider associated with the application was modified in some way.

    • Method Detail

      • onAdd

        void onAdd(ILPMessage message)
        Informs this listener that a new message has been added to the message provider associated with the application.
        Parameters:
        message - the message that was added to the message provider (should never be null)

      • onDelete

        void onDelete(ILPID id)
        Informs this listener that a message previously known to the message provider associated with the application was deleted from the provider.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier of the message that was deleted (should never be null)

      • onModify

        void onModify(ILPMessage message)
        Informs this listener that a message already known to the message provider associated with the application was modified in some way.
        Parameters:
        message - the message that was modified (should never be null)
